); }; let style = { BodyContent: { margin: '0 9.25% 0.3rem 8.4%', paddingBottom: '3rem', }, Header1: { fontWeight: '300', fontSize: '64px', paddingTop: '28px', color: '#3B628B', }, Button: { border: '1px solid #3B628B', padding: '0.5rem 3.5rem', maxWidth: '90%', background: 'transparent', fontSize: '24px', color: '#7A98AF', }, }; export default BestPractices;
